thread.title: The Secret Reasons Celebrities Dress Like That on the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: The Secret Reasons Celebrities Dress Like That on the Red Carpet

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The Secret Reasons Celebrities Dress Like That on the Red Carpet
text: Every awards season, style forecasters track celebrities' red carpet histories and make predictions about what each nominee and presenter will wear to various ceremonies. Will Natalie Portman wear Dior to this Sunday's Oscars? Probably. Will Meryl Streep wear a flawless, embellished gown and look better than ever? I'd put money on it. Will Emma Stone wear something totally unexpected, like a skintight catsuit? That would be a firm no, and not just because the Oscars are a formal event.
